source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_SEQ_00<tab>J'olhmyn seems uncertain of how to proceed.
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_SEQ_00<tab>イサリ村のジャ・オルミンは、悩んでいるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_SEQ_01<tab>After some deliberation, the group decides to leave searching for Alpa to the Kojin of the Blue, that you might track down the villain before he kidnaps another innocent to obtain the Philosopher's Fin. However, one more problem presents itself: given his lax standards for the Three Wonders, it is unclear whether Jaab will make a Namazu of Yuzuka Manor or one from Dhoro Iloh his next target. To cover more ground, you and Kabuto agree to split up with the two Miqo'te and speak with Seigetsu the Enlightened whilst they investigate the situation in Yanxia.
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_SEQ_01<tab>ジャ・オルミンと話した。賢者のヒレがナマズオ族を指していると推察した冒険者たちは、二手にわかれて、ジャ・オルミンとメ・ゼト・ティアはユヅカ代官屋敷へ、冒険者とカブトはドーロ・イローに向かうことに決めた。アジムステップのドーロ・イローにいる「カブト」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_SEQ_02<tab>As expected, you find Seigetsu the Enlightened at Dhoro Iloh. It transpires that a performance based on the “Grey Kings of Orient” carol is planned for the Seven Hundred Seventy-Seven's next festival activity, and they have been spreading word of it far and wide. Most interestingly, the production includes the role of “philosopher-king” and─though there clearly was significant disagreement on the subject─said role has long since been assigned to Gyorei. Judging that the temptation of a Namazu called “philosopher-king” would be irresistible to Nhaza'a, you conclude that Gyorei will almost certainly be his next target. Unfortunately, she is currently away from Dhoro Iloh on an errand, so you can only hope to catch up to her before Nhaza'a does.
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_SEQ_02<tab>カブトと話していると、ギョシンと光風院セイゲツが現れた。次にナザ・ア・ジャーブが狙うのは、近々開催する奇祭で賢者役を務めるギョレイである可能性が高いようだ。明けの玉座の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAA0501 /var>」で見渡して、ギョレイを探そう。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_SEQ_03<tab>You search for Gyorei at the Dawn Throne, but are unable to reach her before Nhaza'a unceremoniously stuffs her in a barrel. Seeing your approach, he hastily kicks said barrel over the edge and into the waters below, jumping down and swiftly disappearing after it.
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_SEQ_03<tab>ギョレイがナザ・ア・ジャーブに連れ去られてしまった。明けの玉座の「ギョシン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_SEQ_04<tab>Unsure what to do now, you consult with J'olhmyn via linkpearl. She proposes that you attempt to rout Nhaza'a in Kugane, where the thief will almost certainly be heading to pass off his faux Three Wonders on an unsuspecting maiden or hopeful suitor. Though you are eager to make it back to the port city before Nhaza'a does, you agree to first report back to Seigetsu the Enlightened, lest he have any wisdom to offer.
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_SEQ_04<tab>ギョシンと話した。まずは、光風院セイゲツに状況を報告しておきたいという。ドーロ・イローの「ギョシン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_SEQ_05<tab>Gyoshin relates the woeful tale of Gyorei's capture to Seigetsu the Enlightened, and is on the point of joining your rescue operation when his wiser compatriot points out that he, unprepared for battle as he is, would likely not be of much use. Thus you part from the two Namazu, Seigetsu the Enlightened vowing to design an “infallible” stratagem to defeat Nhaza'a Jaab before the pair meets you in Kugane.
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_SEQ_05<tab>ギョシンと話した。光風院セイゲツとともに、ギョレイを取り戻すための秘策の準備をするという。一方、ギョレイを連れ去ったことで、三種の至宝をすべて揃えたナザ・ア・ジャーブの目的とは……。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_SEQ_06<tab>

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Kabuto at Dhoro Iloh.
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_TODO_00<tab>ドーロ・イローのカブトと話す

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_TODO_01<tab>Search for Gyorei at the Dawn Throne.
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_TODO_01<tab>明けの玉座の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAA0501 /var>で見渡す

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Gyoshin.
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_TODO_02<tab>ギョシンと話す

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Gyoshin.
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_TODO_03<tab>ドーロ・イローのギョシンと話す

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_001<tab>We can say with some certainty that Nhaza'a has made for either Yanxia or the Azim Steppe, where he can only be up to no good...but it's also likely that Alpa has been imprisoned somewhere between here and Kugane. So which should we seek?
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_001ナザの足跡についての情報は得たけど、
アルパは紅玉海のどこかに監禁されている可能性が高い。
この場合、どちらを探すのが正解か……。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_002<tab>I would be happy to ask the other members of the Divine Circle to search for your friend. There are no finer seekers of treasure on the Ruby Sea, and it would free us to continue tailing the thief.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_002ならば、アルパ殿の居所は、
宝探衆の仲間たちに連絡して探させてみよう～。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_003<tab>Hmm... While I would prefer to see to Alpa's safety myself, I can't deny that I'm at a distinct disadvantage in these lands. It probably would be better to leave the search to those more familiar with the area, while we pursue Nhaza'a.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_003……この手でアルパを助け出せないのは悔しいけど、
土地勘のないオレよりも、現地の者に任せたほうがいいか。
オレたちは引き続きナザを追おう。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_MZHETTIA_000_004<tab>He's after the─what was it, now─“Philosopher's Fin,” correct?
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_MZHETTIA_000_004ナザが探している三種の至宝の内、
まだ手に入れていないのは「賢者のヒレ」だっけか？

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_005<tab>If our assumptions are right, that's the only one left. And we know he's not too particular as to whether he lays hands on the real thing...
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_005この際、至宝が実在するかどうかは、
ナザにとっては重要じゃないらしいからな……。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_006<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, do you have any idea what could pass for the Philosopher's Fin at a glance?
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_006なぁ、)) (( )) 02 /var>、
ヒレのある賢者に心当たりはあるかい？

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_Q1_000_000<tab>なんと答える？

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_A1_000_001<tab>A fin from Seigetsu the Enlightened? He sure talks enough.
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_A1_000_001<tab>ナマズオ族の光風院セイゲツ！

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_A1_000_002<tab>A fin from Gyokei? He seems an easy-to-kidnap sort.
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_A1_000_002<tab>ナマズオ族のギョケイ！

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_008<tab>A Namazu who speaks, and articulately at that. Yes, he does sound like a prime candidate.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_008確かに、ヒトの言葉を操るナマズオ族は、
ヒレを持つ賢者と言えるかもしれぬ～。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_009<tab>However, one could easily call all of the Namazu who have mastered the common tongue “finned philosophers.” We cannot count on our villain to be so selective─nor do we know if he makes for Dhoro Iloh, or rather Yuzuka Manor.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_009だけど、その者がいるというドーロ・イロー以外にも、
ギョケイのようにヤンサのユヅカ代官屋敷を、
根城にしているナマズオ族も多いぞぉ～？

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_010<tab>What you say is true, but one could easily call all of the Namazu who have mastered the common tongue “finned philosophers.” We cannot count on our villain to be so selective─nor do we know if he makes for Yuzuka Manor, or rather Dhoro Iloh.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_010だけど、ギョケイたち以外にも、
ドーロ・イローで祭りをやってるナマズオ族がいると、
聞いたことがあるぞぉ～？

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_011<tab>Well, if potential finned philosophers can be found in either location, I suppose we'll have to split up and cover both.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_011ナマズオ族の主な集落が二ヵ所あるなら、
二手に分かれた方がよさそうだな。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_012<tab>I'll take Yuzuka Manor. M'zhet can come with me, if only so that I can keep him from accidentally injuring anyone...himself included. Anyway, I'm sure the locals will be able to point us in the right direction.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_012なら、オレとメ・ゼトで、ユヅカ代官屋敷に向かうよ。
行き方なんかは、イサリ村の連中に聞くとするさ。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_013<tab>Then we will hasten for Dhoro Iloh. I only hope that we arrive in time.
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_013<tab>では、拙者たちは「ドーロ・イロー」に向かうとしよう～。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_015<tab>I will chase Tsukumo's captor to the ends of Hydaelyn if I must.
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_015<tab>なんとしてもツクモを奪い返さねばぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_MZHETTIA_000_020<tab>Wait for us, Alpa!
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_MZHETTIA_000_020<tab>待ってろよ……アルパ！

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_050<tab>I had heard word of the festivities taking place here, but I wasn't aware they would be so...extraordinary.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_050祭の噂は耳にしていたが、
こんなにも賑やかだったとは、知らなかったぞぉ～。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_051<tab>By the Big One! Our comrade-in-fins! You are here to assist with our new project, yes, yes? Our latest, greatest event?
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_051誰かと思えば、だっぺな！
もしや、次の奇祭の噂を聞きつけて来てくれたっぺか？

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_052<tab>I interpret that as, “I haven't the foggiest idea of what you speak,” so allow me to explain─thoroughly! We are currently planning our most ambitious event to date: an exceedingly cultured performance based on the beloved carol of eld, “Grey Kings of Orient.”
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_052ふむ、詳しい説明が必要なようだな。
この程、古典『東方三賢録』に記されていた、
文明的な祭を模倣して、開催することになっているのだよ。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_053<tab>We have spread word of our upcoming masterpiece far and wide, from Kugane to Yanxia, so doubtless a great many will be in attendance.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_053そこで集客のため、クガネやヤンサで、
大いに喧伝して回っていたのだ。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_054<tab>By the by, sir, it is rare to see one such as yourself here on the Steppe. Am I correct in assuming that you are an ambassador of the Kojin tribe? And how might I address you?
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_054<tab>ところで、そちらはコウジン族と見受けるが……？

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_055<tab>My name is Kabuto. I am indeed a Kojin of the Blue, and the leader of the Divine Circle.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_055いかにも拙者は、コウジン族……
碧の宝探衆で頭目を務める、カブトと申す～。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_056<tab>We typically pursue treasure, but our quarry today is a villain whom we suspect is searching for the Philosopher's Fin. We have traveled here to stop him before anyone comes to harm.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_056我ら「賢者のヒレ」を狙う悪漢を追い、
はるばるアジムステップへと、やってきたのだぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_057<tab>Oho, are you perchance speaking of the Philosopher's Fin as detailed in <var 1A 02 /var>New Records of Ancient Matters<var 1A 01 /var>? One of the Three Wonders? Fascinating! But why seek it on the Azim Steppe? I am quite certain the records make no mention of location.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_057それは、かの歴史的資料『新古語拾遺』にも記されている、
三種の至宝のひとつ、「賢者のヒレ」のことかね？
なぜ、そのような代物がここにあると？

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_058<tab>Ah, so naturally, having spoken to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you concluded that I would most readily be identified as the source of the requisite fin, esteemed as I am. Indeed, there could hardly be a more obvious choice for “finned philosopher.”
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_058なるほど……)) (( )) 02 /var>君が、
この光風院セイゲツを、賢者のヒレの持ち主であると、
そう考えたことも無理からぬことと言えような！

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_059<tab>Wait, wait... I seem to recall from our many, many discussions that the philosopher will <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> be played by you, Gyofu─Seigetsu the Enlightened. We decided on Gyorei for that role, remember? And we already made the costume to fit her!
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_059ギョフ……光風院セイゲツ、何を言ってるっぺな？
次の奇祭で「賢者役」を務めるのは、揉めに揉めた末に、
ギョレイにするって決めたはずっぺよ！？

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_060<tab>The role of philosopher? Perhaps we should hear more of this new event of yours.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_060奇祭の「賢者役」とは、何のことだぁ～？
詳しく聞かせてもらえぬかぁ～？

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_061<tab>Oh, very well. In our upcoming performance, we reenact the journey to the West made by three kings in days of yore. Gyorei has been chosen to dress as the philosopher-king.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_061クッ……次に催す予定の奇祭は、かつて西方へと旅した、
大賢者の旅程を現した、実に文化的な祭でな……。
その仮装行列の「賢者役」にギョレイ君が選ばれたのだよ。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_062<tab>One would <var 1A 02 /var>think<var 1A 01 /var> that the Namazu best suited for said role would be I, Seigetsu the Enlightened, most erudite and learned among us, renowned author of <var 1A 02 /var>A Meditation on the Metaphysics of Merrymaking<var 1A 01 /var>, but Gyoshin continually insists...
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_062本来ならば、ナマズオ随一の読書家であり愛書家、
歴史的名著『大鯰大祭記』の執筆者としても知られる、
この俺、光風院セイゲツが選ばれるところを、ギョシン君が……

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_063<tab>That's it! Nhaza'a must have heard about the performance, and learned that it would include a philosopher. That is why he made for the Azim Steppe.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_063そうか！
ナザは奇祭についての噂をどこかで耳にしたに違いない～！
ゆえに、ヤツはアジムステップを目指していたのだぁ～！

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_064<tab>If he also knows that she has been selected for the role of “philosopher-king,” Gyorei will be in grave danger. Where is she now?
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_064となれば、賢者役のギョレイ殿が狙われるは必然～！
ギョレイ殿は、今どちらにおられるかぁ～！？

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_065<tab>If I recall correctly, she spoke of traveling to the Dawn Throne to retrieve ritual offerings from the Oronir's stock. We've been running low, as someone keeps partaking without authorization...
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_065確か、奇祭で必要な神饌（しんせん）……供物を分けてもらいに、
明けの玉座のオロニル族の下へと向かったはずだが……。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_066<tab>Then we must make for the Dawn Throne at once! With me!
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_066ならば、我らも急がねばぁ～！
これ以上、ナザの悪行を許してはならぬ～！

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_067<tab>I was not really following that, no, no. But I am most confident that Gyorei's fins should remain attached to Gyorei. She needs those!
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_067なんだかよくわからないけど、ギョレイが狙われてるっぺか？
なら、オイラもヒレを貸すっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_068<tab>It's all well and good for Gyoshin to sprint off to Big-One-knows-where, but it is hardly advisable for me to leave the festivities unsupervised. I will remain here, and inform Gyorei of the situation should she return.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_068……全員で動くのは得策ではなかろう。
俺は、ギョレイ君が戻ってくるのをここで待とう。
貴君たちは「明けの玉座」へ向かってくれたまえ。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_070<tab>So these are Namazu? Seeing them in person, I have to say that they're pretty cute. Unnerving, pungent, and weird...but cute.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_070この連中がナマズオ族かい？
なんだか、可愛いような気持ち悪いような……。
とても、賢者には思えないがねぇ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_MZHETTIA_000_075<tab>These fellows' mannerisms are utterly charming! Yes, yes!
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_MZHETTIA_000_075うぺぺぺぺっ、師匠！
オレの様子を見にきてくれたっぺか？

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_MZHETTIA_000_080<tab>Oh dear, they appear to be rubbing off on me. Do you ever have that problem, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? No, no?
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_MZHETTIA_000_080……はっ！
こいつらの口調が感染っちまったっぺよ……

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOREI_000_100<tab>Goodness, how kind of the Oronir to share so much food with us! It will take more than a few Namazu to eat through all of this. Thankfully.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOREI_000_100いや～、こんなに食材を分けてもらえて助かったっぺよ。
オロニル族はえらく気前がいいっぺな。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOREI_000_101<tab>Oh, hello! Can I help you with something, yes, yes?
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOREI_000_101<tab>あら、あたしに何か用っぺか？

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_NHAZAAJAAB_000_102<tab>I'm supposed to believe <var 1A 02 /var>that's<var 1A 01 /var> the face of a philosopher? But I suppose a fin's a fin. And the client won't know any better, so in you go!
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_NHAZAAJAAB_000_102このバカづらが賢者だと？
そうは思えんが「ヒレ」はあるか……
見てくれがそれらしければ、奴も納得するはずだ。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOREI_000_103<tab>What is the meaning of this? Let me out!
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOREI_000_103うぺぺぺぺ！
何するっぺな！？

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOREI_000_104<tab>Oh, no, nooooooooo!
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_105<tab>Stop, stop!
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_105<tab>ま、待つっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_106<tab>He really was after Gyorei's fins! And now he has both of them!
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_106ど、ど、ど、どうしようっぺな！
逃げられてしまったっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_110<tab>I will protect Gyorei's appendages, yes, yes!
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_110<tab>急いでギョレイを探すっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_111<tab>We must find Gyorei before Nhaza'a does.
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_111<tab>ナザよりも早くギョレイ殿を見つけなければぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_150<tab>He put her in a barrel! The horror! The indignity! What do we do?
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_150うぺぺぺぺっ！
ギョレイが連れ去られてしまったっぺよ！
カブトが言ってたことは本当だったっぺな！

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_151<tab>We should speak with our comrades at Yuzuka Manor. They need to hear this, and may have an idea of where Nhaza'a would take his ill-gotten treasures. Can you contact them, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_151ともかく、ユヅカ代官屋敷へ向かったふたりに連絡しなければぁ～。
)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、お願いできるかぁ～？

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_152<tab>(-J'olhmyn-)Nothing to report here. Have you had any luck?
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_152(-ジャ・オルミンの声-)オルミンだ。
何かあったのかい？

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_153<tab>(-J'olhmyn-)...He's kidnapped a Namazu named Gyorei? That's not good─he's got all three of the Wonders in hand, then.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_153(-ジャ・オルミンの声-)ギョレイというナマズオ族がさらわれた？
なら、これでヤツは三種の至宝をすべて揃えたことになるわけだ。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_154<tab>(-J'olhmyn-)But if we are to assume that his sudden quest for the Three Wonders and the young lady's wedding dowry are connected, there's a good chance that he will revisit Kugane at some point─whether to present the items to her, or to her would-be suitor.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_154(-ジャ・オルミンの声-)ヤツの行動の目的が、
クガネの姫君との婚姻が無関係ではないと考えた場合……
ナザが再びクガネに現れる公算は高いと思う。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_155<tab>(-J'olhmyn-)He would have to retrieve Alpa beforehand, of course, meaning that we finally have a chance to get ahead of him. We can return to Kugane first, and be ready to snare him when he arrives.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_155(-ジャ・オルミンの声-)そうなれば、ナザはクガネに戻る道中で、
何処かに監禁したアルパを回収するかもしれないねぇ……。
オレとメ・ゼトが先回りしてクガネへ戻り、ナザを待ち伏せするよ。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_156<tab>(-J'olhmyn-)Let's rendezvous in Kugane, at, say...ah, the Bokairo Inn! I'll see you there.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_JOLHMYN_000_156(-ジャ・オルミンの声-))) (( )) 02 /var>たちも、後から来てくれ。
落ち合う場所は、そうだな……望海楼にしよう。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_157<tab>What did J'olhmyn suggest?
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_157<tab>ジャ・オルミン殿は、なんとぉ～？

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_158<tab>Lay a trap in Kugane? It could work, but we will need to return posthaste.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_158おお、クガネにてナザを待ち伏せるとなぁ～。
ならば、我らも急ぎ戻らねばぁ～！

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_159<tab>We should tell Gyof─Seigetsu the Enlightened first. I am sure that he will have many, many thoughts on the situation. Maybe even a helpful one!
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_159ちょっと待ってほしいっぺな。
その前にドーロ・イローのギョフ……
光風院セイゲツに、状況を伝えておきたいっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_160<tab>Very well, we will speak with him before we depart. He is doubtless worried about Gyorei, and it would be unkind to leave him wondering.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_160では、そうしよう～。
「光風院セイゲツ」殿も、心配しておられるだろうからなぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_165<tab>Does his wickedness know no bounds?
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_165<tab>おのれ……ナザ・ア・ジャーブ～！

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_170<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_170<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_200<tab>I will find Seigetsu the Enlightened and be right back!
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_200光風院セイゲツを呼んでくるから、
少し待っていてほしいっぺな！

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_201<tab>Gyoshin has apprised me of the ill news. And you intend to apprehend the culprit in Kugane?
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_201コトのあらましは、ギョシン君から聞いている。
大変なことになったものだ。
それで、貴君たちは、どう動くつもりだね？

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_202<tab>Yes, if we travel fast enough, we should succeed in reaching the city before Nhaza'a Jaab does.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_202拙者たちは、これよりクガネへと戻り、
仲間と合流してナザを討つつもりである～。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_203<tab>I always have my travel hammer, travel awl, travel spinning wheel, and travel anvil packed just in case. I am most prepared. Ready to go, yes, yes! The sack will be a tight squeeze with both of us, but if you put Seigetsu in headfirst, and me tailfirst...
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_203オイラも、連れて行ってほしいっぺよ！
何に変えても、ギョレイを助け出すっぺな！

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_204<tab>Stop right there, Gyoshin. Exactly what are an artisan and a member of the literati meant to do against an opponent who has foiled even <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? For us to blunder in without a stratagem would be the height of folly.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_204待ちたまえ、ギョシン君。
)) (( )) 02 /var>君を出し抜くような輩を相手に、
職人や文人である俺たちが、無策で挑むのは愚の骨頂と言えよう。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_205<tab>No, these two ought to journey ahead to Kugane, lest Nhaza'a arrive sooner than expected. Meanwhile, I shall devise an infallible plan based on the principles laid forth in <var 1A 02 /var>The Smart of War<var 1A 01 /var>. We shall join them anon.
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_205)) (( )) 02 /var>君たちには先行してもらい、
貴君は秘策を用意してから、クガネに乗り込むのだ。
今こそ、兵法書『万戦奇略』で学んだ知略を活かしてみせよう！

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_206<tab>I do not know what those principles are. Not even a little bit, no, no. But I will do as you say if you think that it will help get Gyorei back...
target:
TEXT_BANALL230_03163_GYOSHIN_000_206よくわからないけど、それでギョレイを取り戻せるなら、
光風院セイゲツのことを、信じてみるっぺよ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_207<tab>What could he be plotting?
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_207<tab>いったい、何をするつもりであろうかぁ～？

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_210<tab>Let us inform Seigetsu the Enlightened and be on our way.
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KABUTO_000_210<tab>おのれ、ナザめぇ～！

source: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_215<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_BANALL230_03163_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_215<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
